mapper.insert: insert into trial_operation (ID, CAMPAIGN_ID, CAMPAIGN_NAME, STRATEGY_ID, STRATEGY_NAME, BATCH_NUM, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{campaignId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{campaignName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{strategyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{strategyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{batchNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, now(3), #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update trial_operation set CAMPAIGN_ID = #{campaignId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CAMPAIGN_NAME = #{campaignName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STRATEGY_ID = #{strategyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, STRATEGY_NAME = #{strategyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BATCH_NUM = #{batchNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, STATUS_CD = #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATUS_DATE = #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_DATE = now(3), REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select ID, CAMPAIGN_ID, CAMPAIGN_NAME, STRATEGY_ID, STRATEGY_NAME, BATCH_NUM, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from trial_operation where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select ID, CAMPAIGN_ID, CAMPAIGN_NAME, STRATEGY_ID, STRATEGY_NAME, BATCH_NUM, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from trial_operation

select ID, CAMPAIGN_ID, CAMPAIGN_NAME, STRATEGY_ID, STRATEGY_NAME, BATCH_NUM, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from trial_operation where RULE_ID = #{ruleId}

select ID, CAMPAIGN_ID, CAMPAIGN_NAME, STRATEGY_ID, STRATEGY_NAME, BATCH_NUM, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from trial_operation where STRATEGY_ID = #{strategyId} order by CREATE_DATE desc
